episodes.overview: Bethan decides she needs to leave but Beau stays behind with the family. At a house party, Ant stirs up some trouble between Louis and Chloe, which causes beef among the lads.

episodes.name: Geordie-licious!
episodes.overview: It's the final night and the squad host an event. The pressure is on to deliver a party to remember - Amelia sings, Nathan rocks the frock and the lads do a strip. Louis and Chloe open up.

episodes.name: The Singles Have Landed
episodes.overview: After living the lockdown life for far too long, the Geordies are back! But this time theyre sharing the house with a whole host of sexy singles who theyll be dating.

episodes.name: Someone's Getting Dumped
episodes.overview: Amelia makes her return to the house, James and Louis fight for Roxys affections and theres shocking news for the singles.

episodes.name: Chloe Shoots Her Shot
episodes.overview: Abbie is at the centre of a big bust up, Nathan gets mugged off and Chloe makes her move on Louis.

episodes.name: Return of the Mac
episodes.overview: Nathan confronts Nathaniel, James is stuck in a Scottish Sandwich and a shock return threatens to derail Chloe and Louis budding romance.

episodes.name: Kiss Louis Goodbye
episodes.overview: Louis lays it all on the line, but Chloe is having second thoughts. Marty is about to relive his past and a shock eviction divides the house.

episodes.name: Just A Kiss?
episodes.overview: Ant has some bad news for Louis. Chloe goes on a date with a model and the house is faced with its toughest dumping yet.

episodes.name: Unfinished Business
episodes.overview: Marty and Chloe go on a date, Louis cant keep his mouth shut and there is a shock announcement before the big night out.

episodes.name: Out Out
episodes.overview: Four new arrivals change everything. James has big plans for Roxys birthday. But will Marty and Louis ruin the big night out?

episodes.name: Make Or Break
episodes.overview: Marty drops a bomb on Chloe, Ant pushes Molly to breaking point and the Geordies are faced with a tough decision.

episodes.name: End Of The Road
episodes.overview: As the hot single summer comes to an end, will the Geordies say goodbye to the Singles? Or are their relationships just getting started?

episodes.name: "Let's Get Together!
episodes.overview: To celebrate over 10 years of Geordie Shore, Charlotte, Holly and Sophie hold a baby shower for Marnie, where they plan a reunion party. But is arranging a party really a good idea?

episodes.name: The Reunion Begins
episodes.overview: Charlotte, Holly, Sophie and Marnie's plan of a big Geordie Reunion comes together! Cast past and present descend on the Toon for the big night but, does everyone turn up?

episodes.name: The Reunion Continues
episodes.overview: The Geordie Shore Reunion continues with more shock arrivals bouncing through the door. Some Geordies will meet for the first time in years, some will make up, some will be able to move on and some will never speak again.

episodes.name: The Geordies Invade Portugal!
episodes.overview: The Reunion and Chloe and Bethan's argument reaches a climactic end. The gang land in Portugal for a family holiday! What blasts from the past are jumping on the next flight to the Algarve?.

episodes.name: Trouble On The Horizon!
episodes.overview: Chloe Ferrys shock arrival causes a massive ripple affect across the whole group! Nathan tries to smooth over tensions by taking the girls off to a spiritual retreat.

episodes.name: Holly's Hen Do
episodes.overview: Louis' arrival causes drama for the Geordies. Charlotte and Sophie throw Holly a surprise Hen Do on a boat! Someone else unexpectedly turns up at the villa, which will cause shockwaves throughout the Algarve!.

episodes.name: The Answer to the Big Question
episodes.overview: As the trip to the Algarve comes to an end. Louis action’s continue to cause drama amongst the Geordie’s and Holly finally gets some answers to the question everyone has been wondering!

episodes.name: The Pitter Patter Of Wedding Bells!
episodes.overview: Marnie and Casey welcome a new arrival to their family! Elswhere, another monumental day looms and the Geordies are in Ibiza gearing up for Hollys wedding day!

episodes.name: Back On The Toon
episodes.overview: The Geordies are back in Newcastle for a night on the Toon! Who will show up and after all the recent drama will it be a Night to remember for all the right or wrong reasons?

episodes.name: The Reunion Finale
episodes.overview: It's time for one final house party at the Geordie Shore House to bring the Reunion to a close. As the group prepare to say goodbye, will it all be on good terms or is there still issues from the past that need to be faced?

23.name: The Reunion Series
23.overview: The twenty-third' season of Geordie Shore, a British television programme based in Newcastle upon Tyne was confirmed on 15 February 2022, when Paramount+ introduced their new lineup of unscripted series and renewals for MTV Entertainment Studios, including the show's new spin-off, although they were scheduled to start in late 2020 and 2021 but have been postponed several times due to UK COVID-19 restrictions. Filming locations include a trip to the Algarve in Portugal, Ibiza and Newcastle upon Tyne. The first trailer for the season was released in late August 2022 and premiered later that year on September 20. This series appears as "Geordie Shore: The Reunion Series" and not as a spin off of the show. This series brings together the cast members to celebrate Geordie Shore's 10th anniversary.
